==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Originally, a 刺史 was responsible for maintaining order within a given region. By the time of [[w:Emperor Wu of Han|Emperor Wu of Han]], the status of 刺史 was elevated to that of governor of a [[w:Zhou (country subdivision)|Zhou]] ([[province]]).
